words.prompt: A ____________ is a short announcement of the latest news.
____________ are gifts of money, time, or effort given to a cause.
____________ is a great difference or variety.
When people ____________, they joined the armed forces of their own free will.
If you ____________ something, you stop it from moving from one place to another.
____________ are plans or processes for doing something.
____________ are new members of the armed forces.
____________ is finding a way to live.
An ____________ is a change in a plant or animal that helps it survive.
If you are ____________, you are able to move and react quickly and easily.
If you ____________ something, you hide or store it in a hiding place.
When something is ____________, it is temporarily inactive.
When animals ____________, they hunt or search for food.
If the temperature is ____________, it is very cold.
When animals ____________, they spend the winter sleeping.
An animal’s fur ____________, or keeps the animal warm.
If something ____________, it makes a loud, harsh sound.
A ____________ is a relationship or bond with someone or something.
An ____________ is a short trip to do or get something.
An ____________ is the giving of one thing for another.
____________ is repeating words with the same vowel sound.
A poem with ____________ has words that contain the same middle or final
When writers use ____________, they use words to create a picture.
____________ is giving human qualities to things that aren’t human, such as objects or animals.
